alert.note: Alert for Butts; Jasper; Jones (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 5:59AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Butts, northwestern Jones and southern Jasper Counties through 630 AM EDT... At 559 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near McElheneys Crossroads, or 8 miles southwest of Monticello, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Adgateville, McElheneys Crossroads and Hillsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
